articles.content: The flagship mobile silicon race has entered its next phase, one that will dictate the trajectory of Android hardware heading into 2025. Merely weeks after MediaTek wowed us with the Dimensity 9400 s… [+18085 chars]

articles.title: Samsung may have copied one of the better Apple Intelligence features - Android Authority
articles.description: Samsung phones already offer plenty of AI features, but it sounds like the company's latest AI addition is derived from iPhones.
articles.content:
• Samsung has reportedly added a notification summary feature to the latest beta version of One UI 7.

articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard DLC plans unknown as BioWare shifts "full attention" to next Mass Effect game - Eurogamer
articles.description: There are currently no plans for Dragon Age: The Veilguard DLC.
articles.content:
There are currently no plans for Dragon Age: The Veilguard DLC.
